Writer: Carlo Bernard (screenplay), Doug Miro (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay), Max Brooks (story), Edward Zwick (story), Marshall Herskovitz (story)
Country: USA, China, Hong Kong, Australia, Canada
Title: The Great Wall
Actors: Matt Damon, Tian Jing, Willem Dafoe, Andy Lau
Plot: European mercenaries searching for black powder become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.
